job_description:
Job Description:
1. Demonstrate proficiency in 3D modeling software for digital manufacturing environments.
2. Develop and simulate technical workflows on VR development platforms.
3. Debug simulation software to ensure system reliability and performance.
4. Create detailed technical documentation to support the workflow and training for simulation program operations.

Requirements:
1. Tools: 3D design (Glb filetype format, Solidworks is preferred), ARCore SDK or other Android AR framework, Android Studio, Visual Studio Code, Git/GitHub
2. Programming Language: Kotlin, Java, C# (Unity), Python, XML (for UI/UX Android)
3. Able to perform measurement and object data collection for 3D design.
4. Skilled in designing 3D models based on real objects.
5. Capable of producing comprehensive technical documentation for 3D design development.
6. Understanding of ARCore concepts for AR application development.
7. Ability to design and develop AR applications using Android Studio and Unity/Unreal Engine.
